title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 72 - Applications For Stay From Notice Of Dangerous Condition ("unsafe Notice") Issued Pursuant To Section 200(2) Of Labor Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 72 - Applications For Stay From Notice Of Dangerous Condition ("unsafe Notice") Issued Pursuant To Section 200(2) Of Labor Law

State Regulations
§ 72.0 - Repealed
§ 72.1 - Application
§ 72.2 - Application; how made
§ 72.3 - Form and content of petition
§ 72.4 - Answer to petition not required
§ 72.5 - Conduct of proceeding
§ 72.6 to 72.9 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 72

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §
100[5]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
